    • Method Detail

      • asQuery

        public org.apache.jena.query.Query asQuery(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClassExpression ce,
                                           String targetVar)
        Converts an OWL class expression to a SPARQL subclass query. That means, the class expression CE will be converted to 
         SELECT ?x WHERE {
     ?x rdfs:subClassOf T(CE)
 }
        where T(CE) will be the graph pattern generated by converting CE to triple patterns.

        Note, due to conversion to Jena Query object, compcat syntax formatting of blank nodes is lost. If necessary, use convert(OWLClassExpression, String) instead

        Parameters:
        ce - the OWL class expression
        targetVar - the variable used in projection of the SPARQL query
        Returns:
        the SPARQL query

      • convert

        public String convert(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClassExpression ce,
                      String targetVar)
        Converts an OWL class expression to a SPARQL subclass query. That means, the class expression CE will be converted to 
         SELECT ?x WHERE {
     ?x rdfs:subClassOf T(CE)
 }
        where T(CE) will be the graph pattern generated by converting CE to triple patterns.
        Parameters:
        ce - the OWL class expression
        targetVar - the variable used in projection of the SPARQL query
        Returns:
        the SPARQL query

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws Exception
        Throws:
        Exception
